sentences.en: My newlywed wife and I are deeply in love.
sentences.cn: 我和我的新婚妻子彼此深爱着对方。

sentences.en: My newlywed husband said the same thing every morning.
sentences.cn: 我的新婚丈夫每天早晨都对我说出同样的话。

sentences.en: A newlywed couple saying, 'we've argued about this long enough.
sentences.cn: 一对新婚夫妇说，“我们争论这个太久啦。”
